== Video Overview ==

This video shows Windows users how to get things done in Ubuntu Linux.  It will describe the way Ubuntu Linux does things in contrast to the ways well known to the average Windows user.

== Target Audience ==

* Users who wish to migrate for Microsoft Windows to Ubuntu Linux
* Users who wish to know how to do things in Ubuntu Linux, who are proficient with the Microsoft Windows Operating System

== Pre-requisites ==

* Any basic Operating Ubuntu Linux Tutorial Videos

== Required Knowledge ==

* Have a background in the Microsoft Windows Operating System

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* Basic familiarity with Windows or Linux

== Objectives ==

* Describe the differences/similarities in Ubuntu Linux from Microsoft Windows
* Describe how to get around in Ubuntu Linux in relation to Microsoft Windows
* Explain how to do things in Ubuntu Linux in relation to Microsoft Windows
